column5: Is there a shuttle service to Armstrong from Thunder Bay that anyone knows of? I have 10-12 people going on my fly-in this year and it seems costly to rent three mini-vans. I can't find any available 15 person vans. Any other suggestions?
I haven't checked how far or cost of the airport shuttle service in Thunder Bay. Their website is:http://www.airport-limousine-shuttle...bay_on_ca_yqt/
Try www.wildernessshuttles.ca 877-801-5466 Prestige Limousine is their name.
